actions.description: The kakkuu makes a Web Snare attack, uses Reel, and makes a Bite attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The kakkuu pulls each creature within 60 feet of itself that is grappled by its Web Snare up to 30 feet straight toward itself.
actions.name: Reel

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). While grappled, the target also has the restrained condition. A web snare grappling a creature can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 10 hit points; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).
actions.name: Web Snare

specialTraits.description: The kakkuu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The kakkuu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: When in contact with a web, the kakkuu knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
specialTraits.name: Web Sense

specialTraits.description: The kakkuu ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
specialTraits.name: Web Walker
